industry: Staffing and Recruiting and Software Development
description:
Recruitment Specialist (Part-time, $50/hour)


Mercor is recruiting Recruitment Specialists for a research project with the leading AI lab. This position pays $50-60 USD/hour.This project is designed to evaluate how well ChatGPT can perform the types of online research which working professionals do each day.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Conduct comprehensive online research on market trends, consumer behaviour, and competitive landscapes.
  • Develop recruiting tasks that effectively represent real-world challenges.
  • Create detailed rubrics to assess the quality and effectiveness of recruitment strategies implemented by AI models.
  • Utilize these rubrics to contribute to the ongoing evaluation of AI model performance in recruiting applications.


Qualifications:

  • 2-5 years of professional recruiting experience, preferably in a reputed consulting/recruiting/software firm.
  • Proven ability in synthesizing complex market data into actionable strategies.
  • Exceptional written communication skills.
  • MBA/BA/MA from one of the top 20 universities in the U.S. is highly desirable, demonstrating a strong educational background.


Requirements:

  • No specific AI experience required.
  • Ability to thrive in asynchronous work environments.
  • Are skilled at online research.
  • Have high attention to detail.


With respect to pay and legal status:

  • Your hourly pay will be $50-$60 USD/hour.
  • We will pay you out at the end of each week via Stripe Connect.
  • You log the number of hours you spend each week.
  • You will be classified as an “at-will” contractor to Mercor.


About Mercor:

  • Our team is based in San Francisco, CA.
  • We specialize in recruiting experts for top AI labs.
  • We are backed by General Catalyst.
